sentence.Network_en: He had been behaving very meanly to his girlfriend.

sentence.Network_en: " Good men ever interpret themselves too meanly,'said the physician.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 好心的人从来都是把自己说得十分卑微的, ” 医生说.
